chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
server: nid
clients: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (server \notin clients)
Huniq: is_true (uniq clients)
the_tag: nat
client_recv_wf: forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool

Goal:
r_step_coh_t client_recv_wf the_tag rc_step

Premises:
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
Notation seq := list
uniq : seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- eqType]
Notation coh := LockCoh
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
nid = nat : Set
eqP : reflect (?x = ?y) (?x == ?y) where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- eqType] ?x : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Equality.sort ?T] ?y : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Equality.sort ?T]
Mem : ?pT -> Mem_Pred ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type] ?pT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- PredType ?T]
mem : ?pT -> mem_pred ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type] ?pT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- predType ?T]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type] ?B : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type] ?B : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
rs_step_coh : forall (the_tag : nat) (server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool), r_step_coh_t server_recv_wf the_tag (rs_step the_tag)
Protocols.snd_tags : seq (send_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- cohpred ?nodes]
Protocols.rcv_tags : seq (receive_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- cohpred ?nodes]
dyn_tp : {x : ?A & ?P x} -> ?A where ?A : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type] ?P : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- ?A -> Type]
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type] ?P : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- ?A -> Type]
valid : ?cT -> bool where ?cT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- pcm]
in_mem : ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> bool where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
[::] : seq ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
Unit : ?cT where ?cT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- pcm]
rot : nat -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
cons : ?T -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
PCM.join : ?cT -> ?cT -> ?cT where ?cT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- pcm]
cat : seq ?T -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
arc : seq ?T -> ?T -> ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- eqType]
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
None : option ?A where ?A : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
eq_op : rel ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- eqType]
ssrbool.SimplPred : pred ?T -> simpl_pred ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
pred_of_seq : seq_eqclass ?T -> {pred ?T} where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- eqType]
eq_mem : mem_pred ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> Prop where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat client_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
server_msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> simpl_pred TaggedMessage
